Wow, contestant, looks like we have a potential match for you!
Don't worry, hope isn't lost yet. We'll give you one last chance to win…
In our Speed Dating round! Here's how it works:
Your date will ask you only two questions, which you will answer as normal.
If your date still likes you after that… then you lose, and leave with a romantic match!
However, if the date decides they're discouraged…
The regular game continues as normal.
